item.title: Appendix D - Properties of the estimators
item.description: Affiliations: John K. Dagsvik, Statistics Norway, Research Department; Mariachiara Fortuna, freelance statistician, Turin; Sigmund Hov Moen, Westerdals Oslo School of Arts, Communication and Technology. Corresponding author: John K. Dagsvik, E-mail: john.dagsvik@ssb.no Mariachiara Fortuna, E-mail: mariachiara.fortuna1@gmail.com (reference for code and analysis) require(knitr) require(dplyr) require(ggplot2) require(tidyr) # require(tempFGN) # DATA PATH data_final_path <- file.path("data","final") data_supporting_path <- file.path("data", "supporting") data_moberg_path <- file.path("data", "moberg") # OUTPUT PATH output_supporting_path <- file.path("output", "supporting") output_table_path <- file.

item.title: Paper Results
